tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: add the global setting that will control if all the views will be recreated on next start

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';
update amp_global_settings set settingsValue='false' where settingsName='Recreate the views on the next server restart';
